name: Kin'emon
text: Activate: Main [Once Per Turn] (1) (You may rest the specified number of DON!! cards in your Cost Area) You may add one card from the top or bottom of your life to your hand: This card becomes active.

effect.text: You may add one card from the top or bottom of your life to your hand: This card becomes active.

meta.notes: Rarity is printed as 'C' in the bottom right corner. The card is a sample, indicated by the watermark.
